programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: A priest, showing the same crucifixion wounds as Jesus Christ, claims to have suffered from stigmata. Experts investigate whether his story is true or just a religious hoax. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: Keith Farquharson: Will Mellor and a panel of experts uncover the shocking case of ex-traffic officer Keith Farquharson, found guilty of murdering his wife Alice in 2019. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: Officer Ken and his team track down an illegal immigrant with a history of domestic violence, while an Indian national faces deportation after overstaying his holiday visa. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Palmerstone North Delta team is on the job fighting crime, while Customs pooch Yarra sniffs out a dodgy delivery. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Delta unit Kieran and Vader vamoose after a fleeing driver in Hamilton, while drug-seeking Yarra is in pursuit of something unsanitary. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Skulls & Scoundrels: The Golds' good reputation is at stake, when a customer claims he was sold a fake watch, and Ashley offers a customer way over the odds for some gemstones. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Gambler: Les is forced to call security when a row over a missing item turns violent, a gambler drops in for funds and a customer tries to shift a gynaecologist's table. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Fool's Gold: Les causes drama when he tells a woman her gold bracelet is fake. Later, it's Seth's turn to suss whether a gold watch is priceless or worthless. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Cash Kings: An out-of-character Les makes an impulse decision that threatens to backfire, and later gives a big loan to a customer with a dubious sob story. Has he been fleeced? (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Hoopty Dreams: The buyers head to Fort Worth, where Victor seeks an ally in his bidding war with Ricky and Bubba. Others learn that two heads aren't always better than one. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Take A Deep Breath, It's Lesa: The bidding action moves to Conroe where the buyers find themselves face to face with an old adversary. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Hoarder Patrol: The buyers compete with huge crowds in Hallsville, where Mary and Moe go all out on a locker they know will make Moe's wife angry. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Throw Momma From The Auction: Moe gets on the wrong side of Mary when he buys a risky locker in Lancaster. Jenny causes a stir when she brings her mother to the auction. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole and restorers Allen Millyard and Guy Willison visit autojumbles in Stratford-upon-Avon and Enfield. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole chances his arm at a high class auction of vintage petroliana. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There:...
programme.desc: UFO Technology: Are UFOs spying on us? Do aliens have access to advanced technology? Tony Harris investigates compelling evidence of superior alien technology. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: The Space Force: Did the space race stop at just the Moon? Is there any truth to rumours of a secret Space Force developed by America for missions beyond Earth's orbit?

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: The Shoot Down Order: Jets are scrambled to intercept a UFO, but find they are unable to complete their Shoot Down Order. (S4, ep 5)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: Texan farm workers are confronted by a 200-foot long object in the sky in 1957. In 1979, a UFO releases spiked spheres that leave a man unconscious in Scotland. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: In Brazil, three men escape a close encounter. In Canada, a thirteen-year-old boy is blinded temporally after investigating a bizarre object. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Area 52: Few have ever heard of the top-secret base in the deserts of Utah known as Area 52, but reports of UFOs have convinced people that the US military is keeping secrets. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Deep Sea Encounters: For decades, extraterrestrial research has been directed to the skies - but researchers believe that UFOs may also be inhabiting our oceans. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Pilots & Astronauts: When it comes to identifying mysterious objects in our skies, few people are more qualified than pilots and astronauts - but are sightings common? (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Ancient UFO Earth Landings: Uncover new evidence pointing to the possibility that ancient man was visited by extraterrestrials, influencing architecture, art and more. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Ancient UFOs: From the lore and history of ancient Egypt to the myths of Native Americans, mankind's past is riddled with the evidence of UFOs. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: Deathbed Confessions: Many believe that extraterrestrial secrets are not just limited to the military - so could deathbed confessions provide evidence of the existence of UFOs? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: The Flash: New ground-penetrating radar reveals that a number of mysterious objects may be buried deep inside of the Mesa. (S5, ep 5)

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Ranch From Hell: Andy and Paul team up with the original investigator of Skinwalker Ranch to probe an abandoned ranch which the owner claims is infested with demons. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: New: Ancient Superstructures
programme.desc: Chichen Itza: Considered one of the New Seven Wonders of the World, the Mayan City of Chichen Itza was the capital of a powerful civilisation. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: New: Pompeii: The Last Mysteries Reveale
programme.desc: Archaeologists continue their exploration of Pompeii, uncovering the secrets of this fascinating ancient city, with surprises to be found and trouble ahead. (2 of 2)

programme.title: Lost Relic Hunters
programme.desc: Nazi Relics: Hamilton White and Carl Cookson are back on the trail of some truly astonishing relics in season two. (5 of 5)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Weird Animal Behaviour: Three extraordinary stories about the supersensory power of animals, including a psychic octopus that correctly predicted multiple World Cup winners. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Ghosts in the Machine: Three tales of everyday objects that are haunted by the dead, including the story of a man who is attacked in bed by an invisible force. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Ghosts in the Machine: Three tales of everyday objects that are haunted by the dead, including the story of a man who is attacked in bed by an invisible force. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Crater Lake National Park: This tourist hotspot is also rumoured to be the epicentre of dark and sinister forces from Native American lore that lure visitors to their deaths. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Canyonlands National Park: A demonic truck driver, disembodied voices, nightmarish skinwalkers and a time loop are all reported to exist in Canyonlands National Park. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: UFOs over LA: February 1942, and the sky over Los Angeles erupts as anti-aircraft guns begin firing on strange targets. Could this have been an extraterrestrial raid? (1 of 6)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Airborne Attack: Anthrax is the most feared of all biological weapons, so when spores were found inside a letter sent through US mail in 2001, an entire nation was terrified. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Deadly Jet Collision: Explore the events surrounding one of the worst aviation disasters in history, when 71 people died after two 747 cargo jets collided. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: New. Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 74)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Allen Millyard find and restore a legendary Triumph Trident bike before heading out for the historic Prescott Hill Climb. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: British Invasion: The big money buyers find themselves out of their comfort zones in DeSoto. A new face from across the pond threatens to ruin Ricky and Bubba's day. (S5, ep 2)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Pawn: The Pawn Stars check out a pair of vintage rock t-shirts, Gumby and Pokey toys, a Gad Ullman poster and unopened Atari games.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln is convinced the lunch lady is holding a grudge in 'Diss the Cook', then in 'For Sale by Loner', Mr. Grouse attempts to find some peace and quiet after moving away from the Louds. (S5, ep 23)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Howard and Harold tear their home apart in 'Runaway McBride', then in 'High Crimes', Sunset Canyon is falling apart and Lincoln and Clyde are determined to find out why. (S5, ep 25)

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Begonia that he is nice in 'Crashing Gargamel's Party', then in 'The Curse of the Smurfs' Treasure', Farmer and Vanity unearth an unlucky magical chest! (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Easter Games: The Buffycats want to organize something special for Easter and Pilou asks her Auntie Lizzy, the best party planner ever, for help. (S2, ep 41)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Isotta's Surprise Party: The Buffycats want to organize a pawesome surprise party for Isotta's birthday. To not spoil the surprise, they invite their friends without mentioning the party. (S2, ep 42)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Cats on Ice: Boss, Blister and Scab play a prank on the Buffycats and Lampo decides to solve the problem by challenging them at a game of Ice Cat. How can the Buffycats win? (S2, ep 43)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement in 'Bucket Pants', then in 'A Best Too Far', Best listens to other people's ideas during the Capture the Flag contest. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret heroic origins in 'Mermaidman Begins', and in 'Plankton's Good Eye', Plankton uses SpongeBob's DNA to grow himself a second eye.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Pearl has a facial blemish right before the big school dance in 'Barnacle Face', and in 'Pet Sitter Pat', SpongeBob asks Patrick to look after Gary while he's away at Grandma's birthday party.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: Things get wild when Sandy goes feral over a nut in 'Nut Madness', then in 'Mermaid Men and Barnacle Boys', a super-duo rivalry threatens to destroy camp. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: The Roxie sisters go their separate ways in 'A Tale of Two Roxies', then in 'Nite Owls', the Dinghy cabin kids discover life after dark. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Double Dangus: The chipmunks discover Officer Dangus has a twin brother that's a bully and encourage Dangus to stand up to him. (S4, ep 20b)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: I Love The Night Life! Top 25
programme.desc: If you love the night life, and you gotta boogie, then NOW 70s has a two-hour antidote. Turn up those disco lights and strap on the roller skates! Oh yeah!

programme.title: Boogie Nights!
programme.desc: If you don't get up and dance, you aren't human! Disco was the best floor show in town & once again it's time to get up & get lost in the pulse!

programme.title: Bruno Brookes UK Top 20 of the 70s
programme.desc: Including 10 million sellers back when it was still a rare achievement! These are the 20 biggest songs of the decade with Julie Covington, David Soul, Abba, Queen, Blondie and Wings.

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Bubblegum Pop! Top 30
programme.desc: Today we'd call it cheesy pop! Back then it was bubblegum pop, and we loved it through the 70s - with David Cassidy, Mungo Jerry, Tony Orlando, Donny Osmond & Brotherhood of Man.

programme.title: Kiki Dee's Duos & Duets! 1970-1979
programme.desc: Two is better than one... good things come in pairs... you get the idea! Here's a 70s icon with some more 70s icons - both duos & some killer collaborations!

programme.title: Spring Has Sprung!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Hamilton's Million Sellers! 70-79
programme.desc: David Hamilton with 30 famous songs, 3 from every year. Each was a million selling single or from a million-selling album, either in the UK or around the world!

programme.title: All Day- It's A MASSIVE 70s Party!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: A Massive 70s Party! Top 50
programme.desc: The hottest party starters from pop's golden decade. From disco to soul to glam to pure pop to new wave.

programme.title: All Day- It's A MASSIVE 70s Party!
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: Simon Bates New Golden Hour: 1978

programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Gwenyn Gruffydd, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Tyle'r Ynn yn cael gwers feicio. Huw explores a special path with members from Clwb Gwerin y Coed.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Mario'n ceisio ei orau glas i gasglu cnau cyll ond mae gan y wiwer syniadau ei hun. Mario's efforts to forage for hazelnuts are thwarted by a mischievous squirrel.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae caws yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddi. Today, Nel wants to know where cheese comes from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae'r bobol Uwchben y Pridd yn gadael sbwriel ymhobman ar l cynnal cyngerdd ac felly mae'r tyrchod yn elwa wrth ei gasglu. The moles take advantage of collecting and recycling litter.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Crwbi y crwban yn dangos i Joni rhinwedd pwyllo, a daw hynny'n allweddol i drechu'r dihiryn Beti Bowen. Jet-boy's turtle, Crwbi, shows him the key to defeating the villain Beti Bowen.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn down i nabod y Piranha, y Melfroch a'r Bolgi. This time we learn about the Pirahna, the Honey badger and the Wolverine.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Al yn peintio'r ysgubor, mae'n rhaid i'w hanifeiliaid fynd ar wyliau dros nos. Ond mae 'na broblem. When Al needs to paint the barn the animals have to go on a sleepover!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ln Las sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ln Las join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Sut bydd bywyd ar y ddaear yn dod i ben? Pa fygythiadau sydd i'n byd? How will life on Earth come to an end? What are the threats that could destroy our world?

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Adam yng Ngorslas, ac fe fydd digonedd o gyngor am blannu tatws! Over in Ruthin Sioned celebrates Easter with a Spring bouquet, and Meinir creates a bog garden.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Mae Trystan ac Emma yn helpu teulu a ffrindiau Nia a Geraint, sy'n benderfynol mai Gwesty Bae Oxwich fydd lleoliad eu priodas. This time, the crew help Nia and Geraint from Lower Brynamman.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlu'r Pasg yn Llyn ac Eifionydd - canu o Gapel y Traeth, Cricieth a perfformiadau gan Mared Williams, Arfon Wyn, ac ensemble lleisiol Glanaethwy. We celebrate Easter in Llyn ac Eifionydd.

programme.title: Ty Ffit
programme.desc: Dathlu taith trawsnewid Dylan, Sharon, Arwel, Gwawr a Becky wrth i ni edrych nl dros ddeufis o ddilyn cynllun iach Ty Ffit. Season finale celebrating the gang's transformative journey.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Ers dros canrif, mae milfeddygon Ystwyth Fets wedi brwydro'n ddi-ddiwedd i edrych ar l anifeiliaid Ceredigion - ac mae'r cameru yn l. The cameras are back at Ystwyth Fets, Aberystwyth.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd chymeriadau cwmni busnes cymunedol pentref Pisgah, Aberystwyth sy'n casglu a gwasgu afalau lleol er mwyn gwerthu seidr Pisgah Chi. We visit Aberystwyth's Pisgah Chi cider company.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With onscreen English subtitles.

programme.title: Sgorio: Wrecsam v Caerdydd
programme.desc: Rownd Derfynol Cwpan Cymru Bute Energy '24/25 rhwng Wrecsam a Chaerdydd yn fyw o Rodney Parade. C/G 17.15. The live '24/25 Bute Energy Welsh Cup final between Wrexham and Cardiff. K/O 17.15.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Cynefin
programme.desc: MaeHeledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn dod i adnabod ardal Rhosllanerchrugog - cymuned gyda llawer o hanes, diwylliant a diwydiant ar ffin Cymru - Lloegr. We discover more about Rhosllanerchrugog.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Mae Barry'n cymryd safiad cadarn i adennill rheolaeth, mae Roberts yn gwneud aberth i ryddhau ffrind, a daw Peter i wybod y gwir am ei ffrind da. Barry takes a firm stand to regain control.

programme.title: Troseddau Cymru Gyda Sian Lloyd
programme.desc: Mae Heddlu Gogledd Cymru yn darganfod gang troseddol sy'n defnyddio plentyn i werthu cyffuriau. North Wales Police discover a criminal gang are trafficking a young boy to sell drugs.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres lle bydd Aled Samuel a'r hanesydd adeiladau, Bethan Scorey, yn edrych ar wahanol fathau o gartrefi yng Nghymru. Y tro hwn: bythynnod. This time, we focus on cottages.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, ry ni ym Mhontyberem ac Aneirin Karadog sy'n rhannu cefndir enw a bywyd cymunedol y pentre. This week the Welsh Whisperer travels to Carmarthenshire's largest village, Pontyberem.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Oren egnol yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Energetic Orange arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn yr Eliffant Asiaidd a'r Macac sy'n cael y sylw. This time we get to know the Asian Elephant and the Macaque.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Nel Gynffon-wen wedi mynd i chwilio am ei ffrind newydd, y Llyg. When Nel Gynffon-wen leaves the burrow in search of her new friend, Guto must find his sister before Hen Ben does.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Pan mae ei grys-T newydd yn cosi mae'n gwrthod gwisgo unrhyw ddillad! Pablo finds an itchy label in his T-shirt and decides not to get dressed!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn yn ol i'r flwyddyn 1804 i ddysgu am y trn stem cyntaf a gafodd ei ddefnyddio yng Nghymru, yn Merthyr Tudful. We return to 1804 to learn about the first ever steam train.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Mai-Mai yn colli llyfr lluniau arbennig Mabli ond all hi ddefnyddio camera Pip i ailosod y lluniau coll? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are spring cleaning!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn clywed hanes ci ar goll yn Nhreorci. Cawn hefyd ddatgelu enillydd cystadleuaeth creu poster hawliau plant. We ask the public in Wales about children using mobile phones.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Ni ar y mr! Fflwff sy'n mwynhau mynd nl a mlaen, Seren sy'n mwynhau mynd i fyny ac i lawr a'r Capten sy'n mynd rownd a rownd! Fflwff, Seren and the Captain have fun sailing on the sea!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Wedi gwers natur yn yr ysgol yn trafod cuddliw, mae Stiw yn dychryn wrth weld unrhyw beth sydd streipiau du a melyn. Stiw becomes scared of anything with yellow-and-black stripes.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Cyw, Plwmp a Deryn wedi colli eu pl tenis ac felly'n methu parhau 'u gm. Cyw, Plwmp and Deryn have lost their tennis ball and so they can't continue their game. Can Jim help?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: All Eira gadw Jc draw o'r caban cyn iddo ddarganfod y parti syrpreis sydd wedi'i drefnu ar ei gyfer? Can Eira keep Jc away from the cabin before he finds out about his surprise party?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Huw a'r criw sy'n caslgu sbwriel ar un o draethau Ynys Mn, bydd Meia ac Elsa yn wyna ar eu fferm ger Aberystwyth, a Meleri sy'n ymweld gardd go arbennig yng Nhydweli. Outdoorsy fun.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cn draddodiadol am forwr yn mynd ar daith yr holl ffordd i'r Eil o Man mewn padell ffrio! A traditional Welsh song about the singer's adventurous trip to the Isle of Man - in a frying pan!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod poeth iawn a mae'r tyrchod yn dioddef yn y gwres. It's a very hot day and the moles are suffering in the heat.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Crugwen yn ymddeol ac mae Cadi a'r dreigiau yn trefnu parti ffarwelio syrpreis iddi. Crugwen is retiring and Cadi and the dragons are planning a surprise farewell party.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Giamocs yn dod lan hefo cynllun clyfar i'w chael hi a Chff mewn i'r Crawcdy. Giamocs comes up with a cunning plan for herself and Chiff to be delivered as a parcel into Toad Hall.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddynt chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc. Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn cyfarfod ffrind newydd, Gwyrdd. Blue and Yellow meet a new friend - Green.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon, cawn ddysgu mwy am y Morlo a'r Twcan. In this programme, we learn about the Seal and the Toucan.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae criw o lygod yn credu bod Benja yn arwr, ac yn gofyn iddo fynd i nl eu pys sydd wedi cael eu dwyn. A band of mice mistake Benja for a hero and enlist him to retrieve their stolen peas.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pan mae creision yn mynd i bobman mae'n rhaid i Pablo a'r anifeiliaid deithio i ben mynydd, i waelod y mr, ac i'r lleuad i'w cael nhw nl. Pablo opens a packet of crisps too fast - uh-oh!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael cystadleuaeth cerdded mynydd. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a mountain hiking competition!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ar y Newffion heddiw byddwn ni'n clywed mwy am drychfilod ymhob rhan o Gymru. A beast has been seen roaming around Bala - this, and some more Welsh children's news in Newffion Ni.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Sgwrs dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Elin Fflur sy'n siarad gyda'r actor Richard Elfyn y tro hyn, i ddysgu mwy am ei fywyd personol a'i yrfa. This time, Elin Fflur chats to actor Richard Elfyn about his life and career. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Catrin Herbert a Cat Morris fydd yn westeion heno, i son am bodlediad Pob Lwc Babe. Catrin Herbert and Cat Morris will be our guests to talk about the Pob Lwc Babe podcast.

programme.title: Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, dwy ferch ifanc sydd 'u bryd ar wneud elw drwy adnewyddu ty yng Nghlynderwen. This time, two young women are looking to make a profit by renovating a house in Clynderwen.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Y digrifwr o Majorca, Ignacio Lopez, sydd a'r her o ddysgu Cymraeg tro ma, efo help y comediwr Tudur Owen. Mallorcan comedian Ignacio Lopez learns Welsh with the help of comedian Tudur Owen.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Beth sy'n mynd i fyny?: Pan mae Barcud Mo yn mynd yn sownd ar ben t swyddfa, mae'r Tm yn gwybod sut i gadw eu traed ar y ddaear. Mo's kite gets stuck up on an office roof!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bela wrth ei bodd yn garddio ac yn falch tu hwnt o'i blodau lliwgar. Pan aiff rhai ar goll, mae'n gwybod pwy sydd ar fai - Anni! Bella's colourful flowers go missing - who's to blame?

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan aiff Dan i chwilio am Pigog yn y Coed Gwyllt heb ei sbectol ma'r gwencod yn chwarae tric arno ac mae'n syrthio mewn i ffos efo Pigog. The weasels play a nasty trick on Mole.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw teithiwn i Indonesia, gwlad sydd wedi'i gwneud o filoedd o ynysoedd ar gyfandir Asia. We learn about the Indonesian language, the capital city of Jakarta and food like Nasi Goreng.

programme.title: LEGO DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Tra'n delio ag achos o ymlediad, mae'r cwsgarwyr yn mynd a dafad gorniog yn l i'r byd breuddwydion ac yn gweld rhywbeth tywyll. The dream chasers return a doom sheep to the dream world.

programme.title: Mabinogiogi a Mwy
programme.desc: Fersiwn criw Stwnsh o stori nawddsant cariadon Cymru - Santes Dwynwen. Dts gwael, a mwy. Join the Stwnsh team for their version of the story of Dwynwen, Wales's patron saint of love.

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres lle bydd Aled Samuel a'r hanesydd adeiladau, Bethan Scorey, yn edrych ar wahanol fathau o gartrefi yng Nghymru. Y tro hwn: bythynnod. This time, we focus on cottages.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae pethau'n oeraidd yn dilyn ffrae rhwng Mel a Kay, ac wrth i Ken a Kelvin geisio datrys pethau, a fydd pethau'n gwaethygu? Mel and Kay's argument makes things frosty in the K's household.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae Colleen yn dangos sut i greu prydiau sy'n apelio i bobol ffyslyd, ac mae Aaron a'r plant yn dod draw i fwyta eu hoff basta gyda saws Nana. This time: a focus on fussy eaters.

programme.title: New: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Sioned yn dangos sut i luosogi planhigion efo torriadau gwaelodol, ac Adam yn trwsblannu yn yr ardd lysiau. In Pant y Wennol, Meinir creates a large planter out of an old filing cabinet.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd ag Arwel Williams o Borthmadog, sy'n mwynhau llnau simneiau a sgwrsio da'r cwsmeriaid ac sy'n feiciwr brwd ar benwythnosau. We meet a chimney-sweeping character from Porthmadog.

programme.title: New: Ralio: Ynysoedd Canarias
programme.desc: Rhaglen uchafbwyntiau yn dilyn digwyddiad rasio modur Rali Islas Canarias 2025, a gynhaliwyd dros 4 diwrnod o (24-27 Ebrill). Highlights programme following the 2025 Rally Islas Canarias.

programme.title: Gwesty Aduniad
programme.desc: Help i Myra, 91, i ffeindio bedd ei brawd bach, sydd ar goll ar ochr arall y byd ers dros 70 mlynedd. Last episode: an emotional reunion for Ian who's searched for his sister for over 10yrs.

programme.title: Y Sn
programme.desc: Yn y bennod yma, byddwn yn cyfarfod cynllunydd theatr dawnus, ac yn dysgu am ddrymiau ym Mhont-y-clun. Today, we learn about the history of zines, and take a walk around Merthyr Tydfil.

programme.title: Castaway (1986)
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director: Nicolas Roeg. Stars Oliver Reed, Amanda Donohoe & Georgina Hale. A young woman seeking adventure volunteers to spend a year on a deserted island with a middle aged man. [S]

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: 1997. Crime Drama. Directed by Jack Gold. Stars John Thaw, Tom Towndrow & Abigail Cruttenden. A British expatriate in Rhodes investigates the mysterious disappearance of a woman he had befriended.

programme.title: Force on Thunder Mountain
programme.desc: 1978. Sci-Fi. A hiking trip into the mountains brings father and son into contact with the Force. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life A Load of Pheasants
programme.desc: 1969. A look at intercontinental deliveries by lorries that travel through Britain's ferry ports and the problems faced, with a focus on the journey of a lorry driver delivering pheasants abroad.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Fishing for Barbel and Ferreting. 1980. Jack travels to the lower Hampshire Avon in search of Barbel and goes ferreting with Fred Taylor, president of the Ferreting Association of Great Britain. [S]

programme.title: Birmingham Bullring Promo 1964
programme.desc: 1964. Let's take a trip to Birmingham, in this brilliant reel about the 'new' Bull Ring shopping centre.

programme.title: Dick Tracy's G-Men
programme.desc: 1939. Action. Directors: John English & William Witney. Stars Ralph Byrd, Irving Pichel & Ted Pearson. A mad doctor uses a drug to bring himself back from the dead after his execution in prison. [S]

programme.title: Beneath the 12 Mile Reef
programme.desc: 1953. Adventure. Directed by Robert D. Webb. Stars Robert Wagner, Terry Moore & Gilbert Roland. Fierce competition among sponge fishermen leads to a dangerous rivalry between two families. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly Races Jethrine. 1962. Stars Irene Ryan, Donna Douglas & Louis Nye. When Sonny Drysdale promises to give Elly May a ring, Granny thinks he's going to propose and becomes a matchmaker. [S]

programme.title: Warn That Man
programme.desc: 1943. Comedy Thriller. Director: Lawrence Huntington. Stars: Gordon Harker, Raymond Lovell & Jean Kent. During WW II, an impersonator takes part in a German attempt to kidnap Winston Churchill. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1961. The Never Never Murder. Directed by Peter Duffell. Starring Russell Napier, Genine Graham and Maurice Good. A dead body sets the police on the track of a fraudster. (S1, E37)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Yegg Foes in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Gail Hire. The city's ownership has reverted to Egghead, who fires all city officials and opens the metropolis to the underworld. [S]

programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: 1967. Western. Director: Sergio Corbucci. Stars Joseph Cotten, Norma Bengell & Julian Mateos. The Civil War is over, and the South has fallen, but Col. Jonas has a plan to revive the Confederacy. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Press Button Farms
programme.desc: 1967. A captivating look at the revolution in farm machinery and how a farm can be run almost single handed with the help of so many new machines.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Oath. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Alexander Gauge & John Arnatt. The Deputy Sheriff attempts to trick Friar Tuck in order to prove that the priest colludes with the outlaws. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Romney Marsh/Pumpkins. 1986. Jack looks back at a sunny visit to Kent when he tried to photograph a 'flying frog' on Romney Marsh, and he visits a village pumpkin fair. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Mike and Noel bring news from Tunbridge Wells, wallow in the astounding footage of the building of Rugby's Plaza Cinema and talk the label machines that graced our railway platforms in the 60s. [S]

programme.title: Appointment with Venus
programme.desc: 1951. War. Director: Ralph Thomas. Stars: David Niven, Glynis Johns & George Coulouris. During WWII, a British Major is tasked with rescuing a pedigree cow from a German-occupied Channel Island. [S]

programme.title: In The Can
programme.desc: 1961. A charming short film about canned foods, and the processes behind the scenes.

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: The Wall. Stars John Gregson, Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. Netta's husband Michael has a big win on the football pools but then disappears. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 22. 1975. Bernard Manning and Colin Crompton present In Three Minds, Jerry Stevens, Vintage Syncopators, Itojo Kumano, Mike Carter and Barbara Sharon. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Fiddler on The Hoof - Part 2. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Two-part episode in which Budgie's domestic difficulties are complicated by his dad. [S]

programme.title: The Nudist Story
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director: Ramsey Herrington. Stars Shelley Martin, Brian Cobby, Natalie Lynn. A woman is horrified when she inherits a nudist camp but her views are challenged when she falls in love. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: Live It Up
programme.desc: 1963. Featuring music from the likes of Kenny Ball, Gene Vincent and Heinz. A pop film classic from the golden era. Dave (David Hemmings) and his mates are GPO riders who dream of becoming stars. [S]

programme.title: Circumstantial Evidence (1952)
programme.desc: 1952. Crime. Director: Daniel Birt. Stars: Rona Anderson, Patrick Holt & John Arnatt. Cleverly crafted crime drama - A woman seeks evidence that will give her grounds for divorce. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life All in a Day's Work
programme.desc: 1969. A look at people who travel the world by air as part of their everyday jobs, including businessmen and women who fly around the world as easily as taking a taxi.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Letter of the Law. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, R.G. Armstrong & Richard Hale. Bill rescues a man who is ambushed by gunmen and wounded by them, but no one wants to help him because he is a judge. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Help Unwanted. 1963. Stars David Kossoff, Derry Power & Norman Chappell. Complaints come in about the troublesome cleaning lady and Georgie's attempt to help creates a bigger mess. [S]

programme.title: Two on the Tiles
programme.desc: 1951. Comedy. Director John Guillermin. Stars Herbert Lom, Hugh McDermott & Brenda Bruce. A husband and wife are blackmailed by the butler on evidence of nights out until they combine to stop him. [S]

programme.title: Murder on Campus
programme.desc: 1961. Crime Drama. Directed by Michael Winner. Stars Terence Longden, Donald Gray and Diane Clare. A reporter learns that his brother, a student at Cambridge, has killed himself or so it seems. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of April and beginning of May. [S]

programme.title: No Trace
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Directed by John Gilling. Writer Robert Southley finds his lifestyle threatened by blackmail from a former US criminal associate. Stars Hugh Sinclair, Dinah Sheridan & John Laurie. [S]

programme.title: Night Train for Inverness
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Stars Norman Wooland, Jane Hylton & Dennis Waterman. An ex-convict kidnaps his son and takes him on a train to Inverness, unaware he is putting his son's life in danger. [S]

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: 1963. Western. Director: Andrew V. McLaglen. Stars John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara & Patrick Wayne. Wealthy rancher McLintock uses his power and influence to keep the peace between conflicting groups. [S]

programme.title: Campbell's Kingdom
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed by Ralph Thomas. Stars Dirk Bogarde, Stanley Baker, Michael Craig, Barbara Murray & John Laurie. A Canadian Rockies landowner leads the fight against a dam builder. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly Needs a Maw. 1963. Stars Donna Douglas, Doris Packer & Raymond Bailey. Jed plans to go home to look for a wife so Elly May can finally have a mother, but Mr. Drysdale has other plans. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1955. Night Plane to Amsterdam. Director: Ken Hughes. Stars Gerald Case, Shay Gorman, Selma Vas Dias & Andreas Malandrinos. The case of a murder which baffled the police of two countries. (S1, E11)

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: The Job. 1976. Stars Jack Warner, Ben Howard & George Innes. When a petty criminal is fished out of the river bound, gagged and barely conscious, the team must find out what happened and why. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Romney Marsh/Pumpkins. 1986. Jack looks back at a sunny visit to Kent when he tried to photograph a 'flying frog' on Romney Marsh, and he visits a village pumpkin fair. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We start with a trip to Durham's beaches in the 1960s and a look at the life of a sea coal man, we keep up with the fashions and products of 1949 and boogie with the 'The Avons' in 1962. [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1972. Detective & Mystery Drama. The Man Who Said Sorry. Stars Alfred Burke, Paul Rogers & Ray Smith. An oddly dressed man visits Marker, insisting he is the only man capable of helping him. [S]

programme.title: The Long Arm
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Charles Frend. Stars Jack Hawkins, John Stratton, Dorothy Alison & Michael Brooke. The sleuths of Scotland Yard try to solve a series of burglaries. [S]

programme.title: Yield to the Night

programme.desc: Fish Out of Water: When the Queen of Hearts wants to keep a parrotfish against its will, Bubble must convince the Queen to let go. (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Bubble Surprise: Bubble goes above and beyond trying to help out with her guests' mysterious party plans - nearly ruining her own surprise party. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Well-beeing: What happens when bees overeat chocolates? Masha becomes their personal trainer! Get ready! Let's start weight loss exercises! (S6 Ep6)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Knock-knock-knock: The mysterious night visitor frightened the Bear and made a real mess in his house. But Masha knows the best way to overcome fear is to play with an invisible house spirit! (S6 Ep7)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unfriended?: Red or yellow? Masha and the Bear argued which colour is more beautiful, and a wall grew between them. All this turns into exhausting competition of searching new friends. (S6 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Shower Power: When forest orderlies are powerless, dealing with a real epidemic is not an easy task. But Masha gets down to business, the main thing is perky laughter! (S6 Ep9)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Fisherman's Luck: The Bear has a rival for fishing - a Cat with the latest equipment. An unspoken competition begins. Will it be the latest technology, a time-tested method or... Masha? (S6 Ep10)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Like Mother, Like daughter: Masha is playing mother and daughter with Rosie. But this time an honest lot distributed the roles. It's Masha's turn to put on her cap and get in the stroller. (S6 Ep11)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Let's Go On a Bike Ride / Water Play Fun at the Lake: Emma and Eva want to ride bikes so they play pretend with Teddy and go on a bike riding adventure, flying past a shooting star! (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Baby Born
programme.desc: Fun in the Bath / Let's Bake Some Cupcakes!: Emma had a fantastic day playing outside with her sister, Carla. But now it's bath time...(S1 Ep2)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Sunburn: It's very hot outside, so Ollie draws a fan. It blows away Pamela and Raoul's hat. They set off to find the hat and are chased by a Sunburn, a gigantic monster. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Ugly Dog Nobody Wanted: Petula is furious because her parents won't let her get a pet. Pamela draws her a dog, but she doesn't do a very good job and the dog is ugly. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Strange Wishing Button: Raoul is disappointed. He wrote such a long Christmas list that there's no way he'll get everything he asked for. Ollie draws him a button to help. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Concert: When Billy and JC discover that, when Scott was young, he gave concerts with Miss Goatie and Old Jack, they decide to do the same - that very evening! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: A Priceless Treasure: Jostled by Tough Cookie at the general store, Billy inadvertently knocks over a clock, which breaks. To his surprise, he discovers a small treasure map inside. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: We Must Save Mr. Cassidy: Scott has organised a big garage sale at the ranch. Billy is sorting through his things and struggling to part with his old toys; who knows where they will end up? (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Pancho, the King of the Lasso: Deedee Rabbit and his little brothers have made friends with Pancho, a cowboy whose lasso throwing is allegedly even better than Jessy Dog's! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Grandpa's Treasure: It's the annual treasure hunt on Grandpa's birthday, and the Carsons follow clues to discover this year's hidden treasure! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Ice Cream Truck: It's the hottest day of the year in Bumperton Hills, and Cory leads the town on a rollicking quest to find ice cream! (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cops and Robbers: When Chrissy takes a game of cops and robbers a bit too seriously, Cory resolves to save his sister from a life of crime! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Superhero School: Only a true hero can pass all the challenges that Cory and Freddie invent to test Chrissy's superhero abilities. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bored Games: When the TV suddenly stops working, the Carsons discover an even better way to entertain themselves. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Show and Tell: Cory frantically scours the Carson house in search of the world's coolest item to bring in for show and tell. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.title: Dino Ranch

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Winging It: The Jr Ranchers create a prosthetic for a baby pterosaur with a tiny wing, and help her learn how to fly. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Rockslide Ravine: The Rescue Flyers rally to do a seemingly impossible rescue with the help of their whole family. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Eggs on the Edge: While trying to save pterosaur eggs during a windstorm, a damaged Dino Buggy complicates things for the Flyer and Rescue Squad. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Flying Colors: When Jon's pursuit of his stolen Rescue Flyer Badge puts his family into trouble, Jon chooses to save something more important to him than an award. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Stop That Spinosaurus!: When a rampaging dinosaur threatens to cause havoc, thanks to Miguel and his observant na-ture, Jon learns that it's better to slow down and think the problem through. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Spookasaurus: Jon gets spooked by a campfire story about a legendary dinosaur but doesn't want to admit it to Miguel and Min. He learns that his family is there for him. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Bathtime for Bopper: Clover loves being clean and is eager to help Min bathe the dino mites, but stubborn baby Bopper wants to stay dirty. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Min Flies Solo: When Maggie the pterosaur hurts her wing, Min needs to copy Jon and Miguel's skills in order to help her. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
